Name: Save The Heart Planet
About the game: Our human body is a universe, in which many people live. Now the heart planet had a problem, the blood system stopped. It's only you who stay out of trouble, searching the vascular maze and collect enough protein to heal the planet, hurry to save the heart planet and the universe, be careful of the attack of the immune system on the way.
